intro_prompt:
Goal: You need to guess 2 of the 4 possible NEEDS to connect with this person, then you will move to the next scenario.

Context: You arrive at the scene of a domestic disturbance. You get out to talk to an older woman who says to you,

You can' t protect us!

needs_clue:
Clue: Threeof the six answers listed below are correct: Security, Safety, Stability, Compassion, Care, Movement, .
Only guess one need at a time.
needs_general_bot_support_prompts: Hmmmm.  I do not think I understand what you are trying to say.  Try to guess the need?
needs_list:
Easy Mode Suggestions: Security, Empathy, Support, Stability, Safety, Consideration, Respect, Understanding, Shared reality, Compassion, Freedom, Movement, Choice, Order, Shelter, Care, Peace.
